inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of depression, bipolar disorder or psychosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Capable of providing signed and dated written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential must be ready and able to use highly effective methods of birth control
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Dependence or severe alcohol consumers (>300 g/week)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with Hepatitis B, C or HIV
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed or presence of other hepatic comorbidities
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients participating in a physical intervention program at least 6 months before
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, cardiomyopathy, and is taking ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers. Family history of DM type 1.
